review.title: “Summer internship”
review.pros: Pros – Fixed working hours so mostly you manage to leave on time. They provide shuttles or if you have a car they arrange a parking spot. Employees were very friendly.if you are willing to work hard they help uou.
review.cons: Cons – Since this is a big company everybody actually cares abaout their jobs. Do not get your hopes up tobe involved or learn from manager of your department. They give you a person and thats the only actual person who knows what you are doing during the internship.

review.title: “Company still suffering from problems to provide a good workplace”
review.pros: Pros – Some freedom to go on with the post handled on your own. Taking initiative and ease of correspondence is supported. But to some extent.
review.cons: Cons – High level of opposition in the upper management. Unstability in employment policies. Lack of control over company culture. Not supporting good habits of work.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – They should be hiring clever people on the good side of doing a job. They should be honoring good ways and habits of work and punish employee who always try to stand on the bad side.
